Summary: round silver dome on top windows around the top lots of lights underneath
divs: Sighting Detailsi was going into work on the night shift at about 6.30pm on a duel carrage way i was the only car on that road when i was driving up the hill i saw a very large round object in front of me about 200 yards it coverd the whole road it was massive it was about 100ft above my car i could see windows going around the top dome all aound the top a could see a figure of something looking through one of the windows i saw it and it must have seen me thats how close it was if was black due to the very bright light from the inside the object then i was right underneath the thing and there were loads of lights underneath all diferant colours i stoped my car in amazment there was no noise at all it just floated over my car over the trees then it was gone i went into work very excited to tell my work mates but they all just laughed at me but two days later in the sun news paper and on tv there were reports of ufos seen all over the world that soon changed there minds its not like the movies were your car stops and everything goes of nothing like that happend my car was still running i have told people about what i have seen but most dont belive and makes me so mad because i am telling the truth why would i lie about something like this only to get the micky took out of me i know aliens are here and i belive its only a matter of time now before this world is going to wake up lets see what people say then and i was right and they were wrong to doubt me well what i have told you is the truth many thanks
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Preston
There were no other sightings in Preston on or around February 11th 1988
